title: (x) type on US highway signs - Highway Gothic {Evan}
content:
I’m sure most of you have seen this one… but does anybody know what font it is?

[http://www.port-canaveral-cruising.com/highway-sign-FW.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20060604052105/http:/www.port-canaveral-cruising.com/highway-sign-FW.jpg)

[http://www.pinetreeline.org/rds/photos/rds1-15.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20060604052105/http:/www.pinetreeline.org/rds/photos/rds1-15.jpg)
author: copperfont

comments.content:
Interstate is actually a derivative of that “font”.  
More info via here: [http://typographi.com/000931.php](http://web.archive.org/web/20060604052105/http:/typographi.com/000931.php)

hhp

It appears to be like Highway Gothic…  
http://www.dafont.com/en/buy-font.php?v=myfonts&f=Highway+Gothic
